New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James made NBA history as the first father-son duo to play together as teammates.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 19 points, grabbed five rebounds, and had four assists in 16 minutes.
Bronny James played in the second quarter, but missed a 3-point shot set up by his father.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James expressed his excitement to play with his son, saying 'I need to be on the floor with my boy.'
Bronny James joined the Lakers in June as the No. 55 overall pick in the NBA draft.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James emphasized the importance of accountability and teamwork, saying 'His job is to put the work in and get better and better just like the rest of us.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers lost to the Phoenix Suns 118-114.
Bronny James' NBA debut was highly anticipated, and coincided with his 20th birthday.
Others: Bronny James' debut in the NBA was highly anticipated, and his performance was limited due to the team's preseason schedule and his limited playing time.
